Class ModuleHelper

This class is designed to contain functions to aid in module development

EnsureExactlyOne(IModule, IModule, IModule, ref String)

Invoke this method during runtime to ensure that only one of the two given are setup to run.

Declaration
public static bool EnsureExactlyOne(this IModule caller, IModule first, IModule second, ref string error)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IModule caller

The method in runtime validation
IModule first

The first module to test
IModule second

The second module to test
System.String error

A description of the error if one occurs
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

True if there is no issue, false if both are either filler out or none are.

EnsureTypesMatch<T>(IModule, IDataSource<T>, IResource, ref String)

Invoke this method during runtime validation to ensure the type of a resource is the same as a datasource.
